long_description: The North Face Jester daypack totes books, binders and school supplies or essential gear for an outdoor day on the trail. Large main compartment offers ample storage space for large items; front organizer pocket helps keep small items from getting lost. Strap a travel mug, bike helmet or extra clothing onto the external bungee system. Dual side mesh pockets provide easy access to water bottles or snacks. Flexible, ventilated shoulder straps are injection-molded; stitched foam back panel helps protect your back from bulky textbooks and lets you carry your load in comfort. The North Face Jester daypack features a removable hipbelt and a top carry handle.
short_description: The North Face Jester daypack totes books, binders and school supplies or essential gear for an outdoor day on the trail.
